page.title: 04Houghton-Notable Events
page.content: On Tuesday,May 21st.1985,the Prince & Princess of Wales came to Houghton-le- Spring to view a newly opened shop, Bridal Elegance,in Newbottle Street. The Shop's owner,20 year old Karen Hunter,opened the shop with a Â£950 grant from the Prince of Wales Trust. Her parents & boyfriend often help out in the shop.The day of the visit was cold & dull but crowds of flag waving children & adults lined their route through the town.The royal couple responded by stopping & chatting to the public & the whole morning took on a colourful atmosphere .The royal couple left for lunch at Sunderland Civic Centre.
